TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ControlValuePropertyAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ControlValuePropertyAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ControlValuePropertyAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定 对象在运行时绑定到的控件的默认属性。

span.span: Specifies the default property of a control that a object binds to at run time.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在定义时对象，你通常将绑定控件的属性到参数通过设置同时和属性。When defining a object, you typically bind a control's property to a parameter by setting both the and properties. 如果未设置属性，则使用默认属性。If the property is not set, a default property is used. 特性应用于控件以指定其默认属性，对象绑定，以在运行时。The attribute is applied to a control to specify its default property that a object binds to at run time. 有关使用属性的详细信息，请参阅[属性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). 有关 类的实例的初始属性值列表，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of the class, see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何应用指定一个默认属性和值的自定义控件的属性。The following code example demonstrates how to apply a attribute that specifies a default property and value to a custom control. [!code-csharp[ControlValuePropertyAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlValuePropertyAttribute/CS/simplecustomcontrol.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ControlValuePropertyAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlValuePropertyAttribute/VB/simplecustomcontrol.vb#1)]

summary.span: 该默认值也转换为指定的数据类型。

span.span: The default value is also converted to the specified data type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建的新实例类使用的指定的属性名称和默认值。Use this constructor to create a new instance of the class using the specified property name and default value. 此外将此版本的构造函数尝试将默认值转换为指定的数据类型`type`参数。This version of the constructor also attempts to convert the default value to the data type specified by the `type` parameter. 如果无法转换的默认值，未设置属性。If the default value cannot be converted, the property is not set. 下表显示了 类的某个实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the class. |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`name` 参数的值。The value of the `name` parameter.| ||值`defaultValue`参数，如果值可以转换为指定的数据类型`type`参数。The value of the `defaultValue` parameter, if the value can be converted to the data type specified by the `type` parameter.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法来确定是否的当前实例对象是否等于指定的对象。Use the method to determine whether the current instance of the object is equal to the specified object. 对于相等的对象，必须满足以下条件：For the objects to be equal, they must meet the following criteria: 1. 中包含的对象`obj`参数必须是对象。The object contained in the `obj` parameter must be a object. 2. 和这两个对象的属性必须相等。The and properties of both objects must be equal. > [!NOTE] > 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。This method is used primarily by control developers.

span.span: Gets the default property for a control.
The default property for a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当对象定义没有其属性集，使用属性来确定绑定到的默认属性在运行时的对象。When a object is defined without its property set, use the property to determine the default property that is bound to the object at run time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置通过应用属性属性设为自定义控件。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property by applying a attribute to a custom control.
